alert.note: Alert for Clark; Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Madison; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN WARREN, NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE, NORTHWESTERN CLINTON, SOUTHEASTERN CLARK, GREENE AND SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 338 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Xenia, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Beavercreek, Fairborn, Xenia, Bellbrook, Yellow Springs, Cedarville, Waynesville, Jamestown, South Charleston, Jeffersonville, Wilberforce, Lisbon, New Jasper, Brighton, Harveysburg, Spring Valley, Corwin, South Vienna and South Solon. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 66 and 69. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 51 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Madison; Warren
